QuestData.Title: Find Sage Mistwalker
QuestData.Description: $C, I grow worried that my son, Sage Mistwalker, has been gone for such a long time. The land is cruel and deadly.$B$BHe spoke of a recurring vision that he had of a wolf, and went west with a small group of longrunners to seek its source. I believe the name of the place he mentioned was Steel Gate.$B$BWill you find him? I want to make sure that no ill has befallen him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Greatmother Ankha has asked you to check on the condition of Sage Mistwalker. She believes him to be at or near Steel Gate.
QuestData.RewardText: My mother should not concern herself with my safety. But, I thank you for coming, stranger.$B$BSince you are here, perhaps you will help me with a few things?
